sentences.english: From them we can see obviously what the compiler is emphasizing.
sentences.chinese: 从中明显可以看出诉述主体的失重态势。

sentences.english: The 2.5-hour flights will offer five minutes of weightlessness.
sentences.chinese: 两个半的航班将提供5分钟的失重状态。

sentences.english: Blame the term "zero-gravity" for this common misconception.
sentences.chinese: 这一普遍误解的产生得回咎于“失重状态”这个词。

sentences.english: We're all weightless during half a second.
sentences.chinese: 这半秒内，一切物体都失重了。

sentences.english: Experimental study on wear of impeller blades has been performed based on weight-loss method.
sentences.chinese: 用失重法对泵轮叶片的磨损进行了试验。

sentences.english: A balcony that hangs really high, offering a great feeling of weightlessness and broad views of the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 阳台悬在高处，给人以失重和“一览众山小”的体验。

sentences.english: In the paper, the sloshing of liquid in a spherical tank is investigated under low-gravity conditions.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了在失重状态下球形腔体内液体的晃动问题。

sentences.english: The efficiency of these inhibitors were studied by static weight loss method.
sentences.chinese: 用静态挂片失重法研究它们的缓蚀效率。

sentences.english: TGA studies demonstrated that DOPO-BQ exhibited better thermal stability.
sentences.chinese: 热失重分析表明该化合物具有较高的热稳定性。

sentences.english: You are now weightless, you are free-falling.
sentences.chinese: 此刻失重，自由落体运动。

sentences.english: Sorbitol took an effect on controlling weight loss of strawberry at normal temperature.
sentences.chinese: 山梨醇能起到良好的控制草莓在常温下的失重问题。

sentences.english: The study took two sets of rats, both of who were subjected to an environment that simulated weightlessness.
sentences.chinese: 实验设置了两组老鼠，都放置于模拟失重的环境中。

sentences.english: Sending signals back to base, unmoored and weightless and no longer marking time.
sentences.chinese: 往基地发送信号，起锚了，失重了，也不用计算时间。

sentences.english: By the self -exploitation software, the coke reactivity under the condition of continuous thermo -gravimetry is determined.
sentences.chinese: 利用自行开发的软件测定焦炭连续热失重反应性。

sentences.english: Blame the term "zero-gravity" for this common  misconception.
sentences.chinese: 这一普遍误解的产生得归咎于“失重状态”这个词。

definition: the sky spins, the earth goes round (idiom); giddy with one's head spinning/fig. huge changes in the world
to slide/to coast/to glide/(of an aircraft) to taxi
